attributes.action: Make £10ph the minimum starting wage for sia staff across the uk
attributes.additional_details:
Sia licensed security operatives who work in universities,retail,nightclubs etc are having to deal with more antisocial behaviour/violent crime than ever before. We are first on scene to diffuse or detain the situation and are potentially putting our lives at risk trying to stop/reduce this behaviour so people visiting these establishments can have a pleasant experience.
Evidence to back this claim can be found on any job site across the uk and crime statistics across the uk
attributes.background: We in the security industry have seen a rise in security companies exploiting operatives with low pay and abysmal working conditions which isn’t ideal when the industry on a whole is becoming more dangerous with antisocial behaviour and violent crimes on the rise while police numbers have dropped.
